display_long_description:
Join us on Discord! https://discord.gg/gm6TDs3BeB

Beardo Benjo: “Starship Troopers Continuum is a chunky, punchy feeling arcade shooter that works best when played with friends... it’s also pretty hilarious! You can tell this is the team behind the excellent Zombieland Headshot Fever.”

Rhys Da King: “A game that’s not only packed with intense VR combat but also offers that classic Starship Troopers action fans love. The combat feels good, and those boss battles against giant alien bugs are an absolute blast.”

GAMERTAG VR: “Player progression AKA PsyCommander levelling, compelling and the Trooper unlocks attached to the rogue-like element of the game fun and pretty engaging.”

[media]

THE FIRST AND ONLY STARSHIP TROOPERS VR GAME!

It’s 25 years since the Battle of Klendathu. The war between the Federation and the Arachnid is deadlocked, but Janus-4 holds a secret that threatens to tip the balance of the war.

[media]

- 2-3 player online squad-based combat - main missions or smaller patrol missions!

[media]

- Single-player campaign - take on the bugs alone to rank up your trooper!

[media]

- 20+ weapons - including manual reloading, which gives you a buff with each successful reload!

[media]

- The classic bugs return and bring new friends - all hungry, all lethal!

[media]

- Boss battles against Tankers and Plasmas - plus something new!

[media]

- Promote your trooper to citizenship for big bonuses, and advance your own powers faster!

[media]

Team up and fight the war of the future against the most lethal enemy imaginable in Starship Troopers: Continuum!
